subject: Pedal compatibility PS5 & Logitech wheels.
description_text:
Hi,

Just dropping a line to see if any of your pedal set's can be used in
conjunction with a Logitech RS50 steering wheel on a PS5 or are they all
just PC only and if that is so will they work with the aforementioned RS50
wheel on the PC?

Cheers Justin.

conversations.body_text: Hi Justin Lamb,   Our pedals cannot support PS5 by connecting to third-party wheel bases. They are only compatible with PC, where they can be used via USB with any brand of steering wheel.Â
